item.description:
HAC Development committee chair and former HAC president Manny Ratafia will be the featured speaker at our monthly meeting at USNH, 700 Hartford Turnpike, Hamden, on Monday, October 20th. Manny will be talking about new sources of energy, based on his extensive experience in the industry.

As usual, we'll start with coffee and conversation at 7:30 PM, and Manny's talk will follow brief announcements at 8:00 PM.

(It is not necessary to RSVP for this event; I'm listing it as a meetup so that you can get e-mail reminders from meetup.com)
item.how_to_find_us: We will most probably be in the Social Hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Monthly Meeting
